markdownRemark.html:
The personal site was due for a change â€¦ the last time I updated it was summer of 2017.

I just used the Gatsby Starter Blog repository and customized it, then published it to Github pages by using gh-pages.

Gatsby Starter Blog + Github pages FTW.
